TopicTitle: Winchell Chung the creator of Atomic Rockets is seriously ill right now

Articles.Content: Its sad to say that Winchell Chung, the curator and maintainer of the website Atomic Rockets is terminally ill with stage IV cancer. Here's to hoping him the best regards and wishes. I guess we can talk about the things anyone has learned from his collection of concepts, and hard sci fi. Personally his site introduced me to The Expanse, Children of a Dead Earth, and countless number of interplanetary missions concepts.
